field.name: summary
field.value: Consider perform the iniitialization in a different thread

field.name: description
field.value:
For big and complex projects, the kernel initialization might take 2-3 seconds, which is too much when you're developing/testing a web application as it impacts on the start up time.
I think a WindsorAsyncInitializtionDecorator might be introduced. I'm concerned however that the lock introduced on the methods might be a burden, so the developer should use it on development time, but change to plain WindsorContainer (without the decorator) for production.
